name: Sigma Infotech
description:
Sigma Infotech is a leading web design and software development company that offers custom designed software, web design, e-commerce, SEO, content management systems, online business solutions and custom solutions. 
We are a family owned business that has rapidly grown in the last 2 years on the back of strong technical skills and exceptional customer service.  From strategy to execution, we have the capability to provide seamless, one-stop solutions.
